code: import{useState}from"react";import Hero from"../components/Hero";import SearchBar from"../components/SearchBar";import books from"../data/Books";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Home(){const[filteredBooks,setFilteredBooks]=useState(books);const handleSearch=text=>{const results=books.filter(book=>book.title.toLowerCase().includes(text.toLowerCase())||book.author.toLowerCase().includes(text.toLowerCase()));setFilteredBooks(results);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-[#F7F2EB] min-h-screen",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Hero,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-6xl mx-auto px-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchBar,{onSearch:handleSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-4xl font-extrabold text-[#2E563F] mt-16 mb-6",children:"All Books"}),filteredBooks.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-[#4A5C4F] text-lg",children:"No books found."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-3 gap-10 mb-20",children:filteredBooks.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-[#F5F0E9] shadow-md rounded-xl p-6 border border-[#D6CEC2] \r hover:shadow-xl hover:-translate-y-1 transition-all",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-[#2E563F]",children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-[#4A5C4F] mt-1",children:["Author: ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-[#2E563F] font-bold text-lg mt-3",children:["$",book.price]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/books/".concat(book.id),className:"inline-block mt-5 bg-[#2E563F] hover:bg-[#244C36] \r text-white px-5 py-2 rounded-xl transition",children:"View Details"})]},book.id))})]})]});}export default Home;
